content: inspired by seeing a clip of the new golden saucer in final fantasy vii rebirth you can have your own crochet stuffed chocobo with this digital pattern this pattern features written instructions in us terms with large text example photos and some tips on working with chunky yarn **finished size ** using the listed medium weight yarn and crochet hook size will yield a a plushie approximately 4 - 4 5 inches tall using the listed chunky yarn and crochet hook size will yield a big plushie approximately 6 inches tall your actual finished size will depend on your gauge yarn used and hook size materials worsted/aran weight yarn or chunky yarn 3 00mm - 3 5mm hook or 5 5mm hook or what ever will yield no holes in your plush polyester fiberfill tapestry needle to sew also available on etsy 1 and for free 2 1 https //www etsy com/listing/1669805468/yellow-bird-balloon-amigurumi-chocobo 2 https //youtu be/ntzvkmerrks
